result.execSummary:
The defendant Rickey D. HAUCKE was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Deliver Methadone, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Full-time employment, if able, as determined by DOC.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

timeConds.notes:
Five (5) months to be served up front, under the Huber Law. 
Five (5) months, stayed to be imposed at agent's discretion.   Court authorizes release for relative care if the Huber Officer agrees that is appropriate.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Deliver Methadone - No contest plea.   Convicted.  Sentencing hearing set for 01-25-16 at 2:30 p.m.   
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights.   
Minutes.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.   
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.   Not gilty plea.  Jury Calendar.   Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 09-30-15 at 11:30 a.m.   State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.    
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 08-26-15 at 1:30 p.m.   Bail is set at $2,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant must maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs other than those legally prescribed to him and taken in prescribed doses.   Bail furnished.   
Minutes.

RE:  Deliver Methadone, on 12-13-14.
Initial appearance is set for 08-17-15 at 2:30 p.m.
